description:
Stay out on the water longer without breaking the bank. The front entry design means getting in and out of this suit is easy, even when you're on solo adventures. A front relief zipper comes in handy afloat or ashore and integrated socks keep your feet dry and warm.

  • eXhaust 3.0 waterproof breathable nylon provides protection from the elements
  • Latex neck gasket with neoprene punch through protector
  • Latex wrist with adjustable gasket protectors
  • Integrated 3-ply socks keep your feet dry and protected
  • Front relief zipper for convenience
  • Reinforced knees for enhanced durability
  • Integrated belt for adjustability
name: Level Six Cronos Dry Suit - Unisex
